author: bnicholes
msg: Closed up some holes where a thread could escape and exit without releasing
the mutex.  This would leave all of the other threads deadlocked.

author: stoddard
msg: The accept loop was sleeping way too long when we ran out of completion contexts.
All that is really necessary is that the accept look yield the rest of its time slice

author: stoddard
msg: Ooops. Don't whack our ptrans pool.

author: stoddard
msg: Move the socket info initialization into the winnt_accept() loop (this more closely
follows Apaches socket abstraction design principles).  Made similar change to
Win9x code to keep that OS working. Reuse the ptrans pool across transactions.
